name: Pancakes with Syrup
description: Fluffy pancakes served with butter and sweet maple syrup.

name: Waffles with Fruit
description: Golden waffles topped with fresh berries and a dollop of whipped cream.

name: Scrambled Eggs and Toast
description: Lightly scrambled eggs served with whole wheat toast and a side of ketchup.

name: Fruit Yogurt Parfait
description: Layered yogurt parfait with granola and seasonal fruit toppings.

name: Oatmeal with Banana and Cinnamon
description: Warm oatmeal served with slices of banana and a sprinkle of cinnamon.

name: French Toast Sticks
description: Crispy French toast sticks served with a side of syrup for dipping.

name: Bagel with Cream Cheese
description: A soft bagel spread with cream cheese, available in plain or with sesame seeds.

name: Cereal with Milk
description: A bowl of your favorite cereal served with fresh milk.
